title: Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Based on Basic Mathematics Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic arithmetic operations at a 4th-grade elementary level
context.additional_context: Learning environment simulating real-world workplace scenarios to enhance mathematical problem-solving skills required for routine tasks (budgeting, data analysis, etc.)

learning_goals: Solve work-related math problems (e.g., discount calculations, statistical interpretation) with ≥80% accuracy in simulation-based scenarios.
Through team-based simulation activities, learners can implement problem-solving strategies reflecting peer feedback at least three times.
Based on simulation performance results, learners can create individual error analysis reports and develop correction plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
